ai-tha-ap203:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap203:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap203:4.2_0: and skeleton without flesh or blood,
ai-tha-ap203:4.3_0: I have realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
ai-tha-ap203:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kaṇikaṇṇa.
ai-tha-ap203:6.1_0: first in the past, the senior monks was compassionate.
